Class DisplayImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.display.DisplayImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Display, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisplayAsJFrame, DisplayControllerAbstract, DisplayControllerMessagingAbstract, DisplayFacade, DynamicDisplayWithoutJxBrowser

    public abstract class DisplayImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Display
    A simple implementation of a Display
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
